answers.author: Stephen Monaghan
answers.text:
We use SharePoint 2010 extensively for both our internal Intranet and public Internet sites. You can contact me directly and I can provide you technical staff contacts for further info. steve.monaghan@co.nevada.ca.us

author: Toni Shope
text:
A NC Locality is looking to network with others using SharePoint 2010.  Are you currently using SharePoint 2010 for your Intranet?  If so, is the service oriented or division?  Do you utilize My Sites?  
Please provide contact information so we can find out further informaiton. 
Thank you.
title: SharePoint 2010
